org.canova.api.split

Class LimitFileSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.canova.api.split.BaseInputSplit
      • org.canova.api.split.FileSplit
        • org.canova.api.split.LimitFileSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, InputSplit, Writable

    public class LimitFileSplit
extends FileSplit
    File input split that allows limits on number of files loaded. Define total number of examples to pull from the dataset. Use numCategories to split the numExamples and pull equal number of examples per category. Use pattern and patternPosition to segment the filename that represents the category. Created by nyghtowl on 11/9/15.
    See Also:
